content:
Write a concise summary of the provided text.
Leonard Nimoy is best known for playing the role of Spock in the Star Trek television series and films. Nimoy also starred in many other television series and films, as well as directing some feature films and producing two films. He was an avid photographer and also wrote and published several books of poetry.

Leonard Nimoy is renowned for his role as Spock in Star Trek, but he also had a diverse career, starring in various TV series and films, directing feature films, and producing two films. Additionally, he was an avid photographer and published several poetry books.
